attributes.review: Donald Trump is a very offensive person in general. I am disgusted with what he has brought to this country and sad to see what it has become since his presidency. I pity this man and hope he can find happiness at one point in his life that doesn’t come from exploiting others. I know he lies about being a Christian, but I pray for him anyways ☺️ I hope this small minded coward can grow up one day (even though he is ancient already). I rate this app a 1/5 and would not recommend you purchase it.
attributes.title: Offensive

attributes.review: So I was just scrolling through the app checking it out and A bunch of ads started popping up and I was like okay whatever Until it started asking iF I was a female and details aboUt my Body and it wanted me to turn on my loCation!! I thinK TRUMP might want to find out who I am and go on a date maybe but the questions about my body seem a little overboard but then washing it down with his nudes popping up in an add was not the best choice I’m just saying.
attributes.title: This app gives me the creeps

attributes.review: Downloaded the app thinking that I’d get a major discount for concert tickets but I opened to see a orange Cheeto instead!! Excuse me!!!!!! The disrespect on this bus is ASTRONOMICAL. As a U.S citizen, I expected better but of course I got worse. This is a ✨s✨c✨a✨m✨. If you’re also looking for discounts on concert tickets, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. It has the nudes of a Cheeto. BLEUGGHH. This app also caused a virus in my stomach. I hope it has insurance. I’ll be suing also. I’m expecting $1,340,001. Better not disappoint me again Cheeto Ball. Actually you don’t deserve capitalization. cheeto ball.
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED BUT NOT SURPRISED

attributes.review: First of all I couldn’t have been more disappointed the second I opened this ap. The American flag was BEHIND trump. Does he think he’s more important than America?! I was shocked. Then I was FORCED to give my PRIVATE phone number to the government!! How do I know they’re not taking all of my money and freedom away from me at this very moment. This was the WORST app experience I’ve ever had... and I’ve downloaded candy crush before. Do even know how much money I spent on that game?? Lord save me for I have gambled🙏🏼. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!
attributes.title: ZERO STARS

attributes.review: i allowed my child to download this app so show the bad influences in this world and now he’s traumatized. i open the app to what i can only guess is a troll. i have NO clue why the president of this free ( for white males) country would display something SOOO scary to the impressionable children of today. please let me speak to your manager because this is getting out of hand .❤️😼😋✨😫🧠😌🤐👅😞😿😻😶🦶🏻😴🤍👁🤩😹🥱🤷🏾‍♀️💦🙈🤦🏾‍♀️💅🏾🙌🏾👄🍑😎apple it is your DUTY to take down this app immediately or i’ll have to speak with your manager
attributes.title: absolutely horrific!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more on our Cheeto puff, but when I opened the app it took a solid 30 minutes to load!🙄🦖 When it finally loaded what appeared seriously scared me for a lifetime..😔 I saw the Cheeto puff naked on the screen! I got so scared that I quickly got off and turned off my phone. But when I turned it back.. the naked Cheeto was my wallpaper! 😩I screamed and closed my eyes, but when I reported them there was a giant beetle on my wall! Please ban this app! It’s unsafe🙅‍♀️😭😭
attributes.title: Truly disappointed in this app..😔👎🍊

attributes.review: I opened the app and saw the most ignorant comments and statements made by Donald Trump I couldn’t believe the absurd things he said and the fact that he was so uneducated. Is he even fit to be in office?! He should’ve been impeached a while ago and I still don’t understand why he’s in office, the fact that he believes that cases have gone up due to mass testing is ridiculous! cases don’t go up due to testing, cases go up due to exposure, testing only sheds light on how many there actually is suffering😒
attributes.title: Awful APP

attributes.review: The second I opened this app I was greeted by a orange spray tanned and wig wearing devil. It was so bad that I didn’t think anything could get worse but when I saw he was our president I immediately packed my bags to move to another country. And when I figured he was a racist rapist who was in control of the USA I then knew why America was doing so bad and had all of these protests going because everything he was doing was wrong. And I saw he wanted my vote haha that was funny so yeah I’m deleting this app and I wish the worst for him.
attributes.title: Uggh

attributes.review: First of all, why is there some stupid picture of a Cheeto looking guy kinda like sebastian bails but older... is that him? Anyways,that is DISGUSTING and I have more things to say, this app put my cat inside a piece of bread!!!!! like why??? And now my dog won’t stop eating Cheetos, he won’t eat anything unless it’s orange, if you try to give him something yellow he immediately starts biting you!!!!!!!!! I hate this app no longer I will use it and now i will make sure to tell my friends to never use this app never AGAIN
attributes.title: Just no

attributes.review: I got this app because I thought it would help with stuff but I was wrong. This app is trash it is a app with Donald trump and if you don’t know him he is know as( orange man with the wig on who look like he would harm someone) or as ( ugly racists man who does not care about black lives, Hispanic lives and other lives but only cares about white lives) yuck🤢🤮🤮. This is not even good because if it was good it would have 5 stars. Anyways all I am saying take this app down because no one likes this app.
attributes.title: Worst app ever
